keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: In an August 2014 interview with an Army investigator, Sergeant Bergdahl described his unusual upbringing, his “fantastic plan” to leave the base in Afghanistan and his hope to move on with his life.

headline.main: Transcript: Army Interview with Bowe Bergdahl
